title: Room in flat by Alamo Square - NoPa (September 1)
posting_body: Moving to NYC.
Looking for someone to fill my room in our sunny, NoPa apartment.
Move in date: September 1 (6 month stays welcome, no less)
$1,800/month (+$15/month for internet.
Utilities included!)
$1,500 security deposit
Room Description:
-Tons of natural light in the day with windows
-Ceilings are 12 feet high which adds to the spacious feel
-Walk-in Closet
House Description:
- Washing Machine, Dryer and Dishwasher in-house.
Gas grill in the backyard with a firepit that we often use for cookouts.
- Easy access to public transit lines (1 block from 5/5R, 3 blocks from 21 and 31).
Super easy to get downtown.
- Very central.
1 block from Alamo Square Park, and walking distance to the Panhandle, Golden Gate Park, Haight-Ashbury, Hayes Valley, and Fillmore.
- The house is right off Divisadero (and Fulton), so tons of cool restaurants, bars, music venues, and more, all within a few blocks.
-No Pets!
(Sorry :)
About us:
We are three guys, all mid to late 20’s.
We work in tech, marketing, and banking.
2 from the East Bay and 1 from San Diego.
We all get along and kick it together, but also have our individual friend groups.
Some of our interests are basketball, cycling, golf, camping, cars, skiing, and most fun outdoor activities.
We prefer to have someone who's socially active and down to have a few drinks with the house from time to time.
Also the date is flexible if you want to move in earlier.
We look forward to meeting you.
